message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $9500. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8200. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9800. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a great value!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer the product to you for $9400. It's still a great value, and I think it's worth considering.
